ComicInfo.Title: Where Do Wiseguys Come From?; Part Six; The Doctor Infinity Story; Marooned on a Desert Island With the People on the Subway...
ComicInfo.Summary:
Clay receives an odd message
Dr Infinity is gracious about all the people he's ripped off over the years.
Dan Clowes muses about being marooned with the people on his subway car
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 22:14:00. [Issue ID 68661]
ComicInfo.Characters: Geat,Dr Infinity,Billy Schugle,Swain,Nat Knudson,Beatrice,Dan Pussey,Clay Loudermilk,Venus,Roy Hoover
